comment._content: I met Derek at an event earlier this summer and we chatted about the LSE History photos. He talked about first coming to LSE in 1968: he worked previously at Edinburgh University – a very traditional and hierarchical institution – and arrived at LSE to find the students in revolt, quite a contrast! The staff culture as also much more informal: apparently Anne Bohm claimed that she did most of her work as Dean and Registrar of the Graduate school in the Senior Common Room!
